script.name: !lib.ship.plotpath
script.sourceplaintext:
* first check if we are already there if is datatype[ $a.destination ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $dest.sector = $a.destination[3] else if $a.destination -> is of class Sector $dest.sector = $a.destination else $dest.sector = $a.destination -> get sector end do if $dest.sector == [SECTOR] return [TRUE] $destination.sector = $dest.sector
* check if the destination is blacklsted $is.whitelsted = [FALSE] if $a.exclude $block.type = $a.exclude[$dest.sector] if $block.type == [Blacklist.Block] return null else if $block.type == [Blacklist.Whitelist] $is.whitelsted = [TRUE] end end
if not $is.whitelsted if is datatype[ $a.raceBlock ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $dest.sector.owner = $dest.sector -> get sector if find $dest.sector.owner in array: $a.raceBlock return null end else if is datatype[ $a.raceBlock ] == DATATYPE_TABLE $dest.sector.owner = $dest.sector -> get sector if $a.raceBlock[$dest.sector.owner] return null end end end
@ $is.gateless = [NULL] -> call script !lib.is.sector.gateless : Sector=$dest.sector @ $in.gateless = [NULL] -> call script !lib.is.sector.gateless : Sector=[SECTOR]
* now check if we can jump straight there $should.jump = [FALSE] $min.jumps = 0 if not $a.ignoreJump OR $is.gateless $has.jumpdrive = [THIS] -> get amount of ware Jumpdrive in cargo bay do if $a.flags & [JumpFlg.NoDeviceCheck] $has.jumpdrive = [TRUE] if $has.jumpdrive if $a.alwaysJump OR $is.gateless $should.jump = [TRUE] else if [THIS] -> is autojump activated $min.jumps = [THIS] -> get autojump minimum jumps $jumps = get jumps from sector [SECTOR] to sector $dest.sector if $jumps >= $min.jumps $should.jump = [TRUE] else $should.jump = [FALSE] end end end end
* gateless sector always requires jumping if $is.gateless OR $in.gateless $should.jump = [FALSE] if not $a.flags & [JumpFlg.NoDeviceCheck] if not [THIS] -> get amount of ware Jumpdrive in cargo bay skip if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Advanced Jumpdrive in cargo bay return null end end
if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Advanced Jumpdrive in cargo bay $need.energy = 0 else if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Jumpdrive Energy Generator in cargo bay $need.energy = 0 else $need.energy = [THIS] -> needed jump drive energy for jump to sector $dest.sector end $got.energy = [THIS] -> get true amount of ware Energy Cells in cargo bay if $got.energy >= $need.energy $ret = create new array, arguments=$a.destination, null, null, null, null return $ret end return null end
if $should.jump $flags = [Find.JumpableGate] | [Find.JumpBeacons] | [Find.Known] | [Find.Nearest]
if is datatype[ $a.destination ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $jump.gate = find gate: flags=$flags, refobj=null, max dist=null, refpos=$a.destination object check=[THIS] else if is datatype[ $a.destination ] == DATATYPE_SECTOR $jump.gate = find gate: flags=$flags, refobj=$a.destination, max dist=null, refpos=null object check=[THIS] else $dest.pos = $a.destination -> get position as array if $dest.pos $dest.sector = $a.destination -> get sector append $dest.sector to array $dest.pos $flags = $flags | [Find.ForceUsePos] $jump.gate = find gate: flags=$flags, refobj=null, max dist=null, refpos=$dest.pos object check=[THIS] else $jump.gate = find gate: flags=$flags, refobj=$a.destination, max dist=null, refpos=null object check=[THIS] end end
if $jump.gate -> exists if $a.ignoreFuel $ret = create new array, arguments=$jump.gate, null, null, null, null return $ret else $jumps = get jumps from sector [SECTOR] to sector $dest.sector if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Advanced Jumpdrive in cargo bay $need.energy = 0 else if [THIS] -> get amount of ware Jumpdrive Energy Generator in cargo bay $need.energy = 0 else $need.energy = [THIS] ->get needed jump energy: jumps=$jumps end $got.energy = [THIS] -> get true amount of ware Energy Cells in cargo bay if $got.energy >= $need.energy $ret = create new array, arguments=$jump.gate, null, null, null, null return $ret end end end end
if not [THIS] ->can fly through gates return null end
* =============================== $table.exclude = table alloc if is datatype[ $a.exclude ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $i = size of array $a.exclude while $i dec $i = $sector = $a.exclude[$i] $table.exclude[$sector] = [TRUE] end else if is datatype[ $a.exclude ] == DATATYPE_TABLE $table.exclude = $a.exclude end
$weights = table alloc $owner.block = table alloc $owner.avoid = table alloc
if is datatype[ $a.raceAvoid ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $i = size of array $a.raceAvoid while $i dec $i = $race = $a.raceAvoid[$i] do if $race == Player OR $race == Other continue $weights[$race] = 1000 $owner.avoid[$race] = [TRUE] end else if is datatype[ $a.raceAvoid ] == DATATYPE_TABLE $owner.avoid = $a.raceAvoid $race = get next key: table=$a.raceAvoid key=null while $race do if $race != Player AND $race != Other $weights[$race] = 1000 $race = get next key: table=$a.raceAvoid key=$race end end
if is datatype[ $a.raceBlock ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $i = size of array $a.raceBlock while $i dec $i = $race = $a.raceBlock[$i] do if $race == Player OR $race == Other continue $weights[$race] = 10000 $owner.block[$race] = [TRUE] end else if is datatype[ $a.raceBlock ] == DATATYPE_TABLE $owner.block = $a.raceBlock $race = get next key: table=$a.raceBlock key=null while $race do if $race != Player AND $race != Other $weights[$race] = 10000 $race = get next key: table=$a.raceBlock key=$race end end
@ $route = [THIS] -> call script !lib.ship.plotroute : Destination=$a.destination Ignore Jumping=$a.ignoreJump Weights Table=$weights Always Jump=$a.alwaysJump Ignore Fuel=$a.ignoreFuel Jump Flags=$a.flags
skip if $route return null skip if size of array $route return null
* check route if it goes throgh any excluded sectors $excluded = [FALSE]
$i = size of array $route $size = size of array $route while $i dec $i = $dest = $route[$i] $dest.sector = $dest -> get sector do if $dest.sector == [SECTOR] continue if $dest.sector != $destination.sector if not $dest.sector -> is known $excluded = [TRUE] break end end $exclude.type = $table.exclude[$dest.sector] if $exclude.type == [Blacklist.Whitelist] continue else if $exclude.type == [Blacklist.Block] OR $exclude.type == [Blacklist.Avoid] $excluded = [TRUE] break end $sector.owner = $dest.sector -> get owner race if $owner.block[$sector.owner] $excluded = [TRUE] break end end
skip if $excluded return $route
* plot a new path, avoiding excluded $target.sector = [THIS] -> get sector if is datatype[ $a.destination ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $current.sector = $a.destination[3] else $current.sector = $a.destination -> get sector end $closed.list = table alloc $open.list = table alloc $sector = $current.sector gosub sub.GetJumps $array = create new array, size=3, elements=0, $jumps.projected, null, null, null, null, null, null $open.list[$current.sector] = $array
$got.energy = [THIS] -> get true amount of ware Energy Cells in cargo bay do if $a.ignoreFuel OR $a.flags & [JumpFlg.NoEnergyCheck] $got.energy = 2147483647
@ = wait 1 ms $instructions = 50
* start A* while $current.sector != $target.sector gosub sub.NextSector
if $should.jump $jumps = get jumps from sector $current.sector to sector $target.sector if $jumps >= $min.jumps $need.energy = [THIS] ->get needed jump energy: jumps=$jumps if $got.energy >= $need.energy OR $a.ignoreFuel $flags = [Find.JumpableGate] | [Find.JumpBeacons] | [Find.Known] do if find gate: flags=$flags, refobj=$current.sector, max dist=null, refpos=null object check=[THIS] break end end end
gosub sub.AddAdjacent skip if size of table $open.list return null
dec $instructions = if $instructions <= 0 @ = wait 1 ms $instructions = 50 end end
$route = array alloc: size=0
if not $dest.sector if $a.destination -> exists $dest.sector = $a.destination -> get sector else if is datatype[ $a.destination ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $dest.sector = $a.destination[3] end end
if $dest.sector while $current.sector != $dest.sector $sector = $current.sector $current.sector = $closed.list[$current.sector][2] skip if $current.sector break $gate = get next gate on route from $sector to $current.sector append $gate to array $route end end
return $route
sub.AddAdjacent: $jumps.current = $current.jumps + 1 $array.gates = $current.sector ->get gate array: include hyperspeed=[FALSE] $i = size of array $array.gates while $i dec $i = $gate = $array.gates[$i] $sector = $gate -> get gate destination: return sector=[TRUE] skip if $sector continue
do if $sector == $current.sector continue
skip if $sector -> is known continue
$blacklist.type = [Blacklist.None] if $table.exclude $blacklist.type = $table.exclude[$sector] do if $blacklist.type == [Blacklist.Block] continue end
$owner = $sector -> get owner race if $blacklist.type != [Blacklist.Whitelist] do if $owner.block[$owner] continue end
if $closed.list[$sector] $old.jumps = $closed.list[$sector][0] if $current.jumps < $old.jumps $closed.list[$sector][0] = $current.jumps $closed.list[$sector][2] = $current.sector end continue end if $open.list[$sector] $old.jumps = $open.list[$sector][0] if $current.jumps < $old.jumps $open.list[$sector][0] = $current.jumps $open.list[$sector][2] = $current.sector end else gosub sub.GetJumps $array = create new array, size=3, elements=$jumps.current, $jumps.projected, $current.sector, null, null, null, null, null $open.list[$sector] = $array end end endsub
sub.GetJumps: $jumps.projected = get jumps from sector $sector to sector $target.sector $exclude.type = $table.exclude[$sector] if $exclude.type != [Blacklist.Whitelist] $owner = $sector -> get owner race if $owner.avoid[$owner] $jumps.projected = $jumps.projected * 10 else if $exclude.type == [Blacklist.Avoid] $jumps.projected = $jumps.projected * 10 end end endsub
sub.NextSector: $best.jumps = 2147483647 $best.sector = null $sector = get next key: table=$open.list key=null while $sector $jumps.current = $open.list[$sector][0] $jumps.projected = $open.list[$sector][1] $jumps = $jumps.current + $jumps.projected if $jumps < $best.jumps $best.jumps = $jumps $best.sector = $sector end $sector = get next key: table=$open.list key=$sector end $array = $open.list[$best.sector] $closed.list[$best.sector] = $array remove key $best.sector from table $open.list $current.sector = $best.sector $current.jumps = $best.jumps endsub return null

comment.var: first check if we are already there
check if the destination is blacklsted
now check if we can jump straight there

line.text: needed jump drive energy for jump to sector

comment.var: check route if it goes throgh any excluded sectors
plot a new path, avoiding excluded

line.text: get next gate on route from

sval.val: first check if we are already there
check if the destination is blacklsted
now check if we can jump straight there
check route if it goes throgh any excluded sectors
plot a new path, avoiding excluded
